item.title: ES Modules
item.description: ES Modules Module system in ECMAScript standard JavaScript. An example: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 import { foo } from 'first-module'; import * as all from 'second-module'; export const SPECIAL_CHAR = "*"; export function anotherFoo() { // ... } Links Node.js Docs ES modules: A cartoon deep-dive
